TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content:
We vave a few variations, including 

[@Kerbonaught](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/67524-kerbonaught/)

[@kerbonaut](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/23207-kerbonaut/)

But you are the first with the -er suffix. Glad you could get the name you wanted ![:happy:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/happy.png ":happy:")

I petition to have [@Snark](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/125662-snark/) renamed Vanamonde Jr.

>

> 46 minutes ago, AtomicTech said:
> 
> 
> I petition to have [@Snark](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/125662-snark/) renamed Vanamonde Jr.

No, you cannot request other forum members be renamed to something else. Besides, [@Snark](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/125662-snark/) is [@Snark](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/125662-snark/) and shall always be [@Snark](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/profile/125662-snark/), and we like it that way.
Denied.
